article:
'Ingo Potrykus' was full Professor of Plant Sciences, specifically of
Biotechnology of Plants, at the Institute of Plant Sciences of the ETH Zurich
from June 1, 1987 until his retirement on April 1, 1999. His research group
applied gene-technology to contribute to food security in developing countries.
Together with Peter Beyer, he is one of the co-inventors of Golden Rice - a
potential new way to address vitamin A deficiency International Rice
Research Institute: [http://www.irri.org/index.php?option=com_k2&view=itemlist&-
task=category&id=764:golden-rice-at-irri&lang=en Golden Rice] - and
currently serves as chairman of the Golden Rice Humanitarian Board. [http://www.goldenrice.org Golden Rice. 2010]
